Have seen Dr Sim on different occasions for cosmetic procedure and consult for lip/skin irritation. He is professional, gentle and both visits left me satisfied with the result/ advice given! Will definitely go back to him & Aesthetic Works for future skin issues :)

What a difference! After one laser session with Dr Sim and a week of downtime, my face was rid of age spots and pigmentation.   Very pleased with his professionalism and friendly easy manner. His assistant was calming and comforting throughout the procedure. Highly recommended!
